virtual-sensor.name: Jungfraujoch_DozerEventLogger_mapped_1396
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerEventLoggerMsg) from Jungfraujoch deployment in usable form

address.predicate: select TIMESTAMP, GENERATIONTIME, POSITION, SENSORTYPE, SENSORTYPE_SERIALID, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME0, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE0 from Jungfraujoch_DozerEventLogger_muxed_mapped_1396 where PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0 != -1

source.query: select TIMESTAMP, GENERATIONTIME, POSITION, SENSORTYPE, SENSORTYPE_SERIALID, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, (GENERATIONTIME - (PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME0 * 1000)) as EVENT_TIMESTAMP, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0 as EVENT_ID, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0 as EVENT_TYPE, IF(PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0=0,NULL,PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE0) as EVENT_VALUE from wrapper
